text: @PaulKagame @WHO @StateHouseKenya @Macky_Sall @MagufuliJP @Presidence_RDC @CyrilRamaphosa @BorisJohnson @KGeorgieva Good going Mr President, you are already ahead of the game on so many fronts. Rwanda is one of the cleanest nations on Earth and the government's response to Coronavirus has been prompt and efficient. May God bless Rwanda.
